column1:
"FIELD4": "Color contrast
(WCAG) 2.0 - https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG20/
- small text 4.5:1 
- large text 3:1"

"FIELD4": "Primary colors represent the Trinet brand. Primary colors should consist of less than 10% of the color spectrum on the page at any given time. They are applied primarily to main interactive elements such as primary button and input form elements."
"FIELD4": "Secondary colors complement the primary colors. They are used as responses to user interaction such as hover states
"FIELD4": "Status colors communicates status information. They can be used in text
"FIELD4": "Greys should consist of 90% of the color spectrum on the page at any given time. They are applied primarily to background and text elements."
"FIELD4": "Gradients are used in charts instead of solid colors. Charts can use any number of gradients necessary. A chart legend or label should be included when more than one color are used."
